_A_CHECKBOX_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION_: The ACheckbox component provides an interface for creating a group of checkboxes, allowing users to select multiple options from a list. The component supports various settings such as collapsible groups, button group display, search functionality, and many more.
_A_CHECKBOX_GROUP_HAS_CONTROL_CHECKBOX_D: When this option is enabled, an additional control checkbox will be displayed. This control checkbox allows the user to select or deselect all child checkboxes simultaneously.
_A_CHECKBOX_PROPS_COLLAPSIBLE_DESCRIPTIO: Specifies whether the group of checkboxes can be collapsed and expanded. If set to true, the group can be toggled by the user.
_A_CHECKBOX_PROPS_HAS_CONTROL_CHECKBOX_D: Adds a control checkbox that allows selecting or deselecting all checkboxes in the group simultaneously.
_A_CHECKBOX_PROPS_INLINE_DESCRIPTION_: Specifies whether the checkboxes should be displayed inline. If set to true, the checkboxes will be aligned horizontally.
_A_CHECKBOX_PROPS_IS_BUTTON_GROUP_DESCRI: Specifies whether the checkboxes should be displayed as buttons. If set to true, the checkboxes will be displayed as buttons, which can provide a more visually appealing interface.
_A_CHECKBOX_PROPS_IS_COLLAPSED_DESCRIPTI: Specifies the initial collapsed state of the checkbox group. If set to true, the group will be collapsed when the page loads.
_A_CHECKBOX_PROPS_IS_WIDTH_AUTO_DESCRIPT: Specifies whether the width of the checkbox group should automatically adjust to its content. If set to true, the width will adjust automatically.
